Comment: There is most likely a protest in your area this Saturday. In your town, your county seat, your state capitol, etc.. It's important to protest locally as well as nationally. Watching protests on TV is great, and we need those, but seeing them in person in your own town can have a bigger impact. When your neighbors and coworkers are standing up, it makes it easier for you to do the same. It gives a sense of purpose, strength,  and courage.  Do what you can. Don't fail to act because you think you won't have a big enough impact.
Author: rocksyoursocks
